overview: Tells different lovers of backgrounds namely Hazama son of a former criminal while Azar Azmi plays the character as Amelina, the son of a police officer.  Hazama and Amelina are students at a university and the romance point between the two individuals begins when they follow the orientation week. Previously, they did not admit that they were competing with each other, until a story that brought about a sense of love. Amalina did not know that Erman was the son of the famous gangster leader while Amalina's father was a policeman who had betrayed Erman's father.

production_companies.name: Tanah Beris Film Production Sdn Bhd

title: Uniknya Cinta
